transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello. Haanji, main Armaan baat kar raha hun. Armaan baat kar raha hun se.
Executive: Kahan se?
Customer: Chhattisgarh se baat kar raha hun. Chhattisgarh se baat kar raha hun.
Customer: Are bhaiya.
(silence)
